ygData.msgSnippet: Hey..thank you!  Very helpful! Cook Miller-ETOP03  on 04/06/2001 01:24:50 PM Please respond to EverQuest@yahoogroups.com To:
ygData.messageBody:
Hey..thank you! Very helpful!




Cook Miller-ETOP03 <etop03@...> on 04/06/2001 01:24:50 PM

Please respond to EverQuest@yahoogroups.com

To: "'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'" <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
cc:
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Digest Number 214


Hi all,

I lurk on a bunch of groups and post on a few as I have a 40 bard and 25
cleric. For that up and coming bard, here are some other yahoo groups and
sites you can use for reference. For the guy on the ship needing to
subscribe via email, some of these are more active than others, but I hope
you can get you fix this way. Here they are:

Bard specific yahoo groups:
eqbards@yahoogroups.com
EQ-Bards@yahoogroups.com

Other yahoo groups I belong to:
EQ_Monk@yahoogroups.com
EQ-Clerics@yahoogroups.com
EQ_Cleric@yahoogroups.com

Bard websites for the up and coming bard:
http://www.attcanada.net/~reaper/
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/eqbard.htm
http://eqsongs.com/
http://www.sok.org/soerbaird/
http://users.erols.com/gww6e/eq/HOWTO-twist-bard-songs.html
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/Sylly/

General use sites:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/eqcommands.htm
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/eqglossary.htm


Hope you enjoy these,

Piemur
Bard of the 40th Song
Robiinton
Cleric of the 25th Heal
The Nameless

Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
